message: Hello Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you. After careful consideration, we have decided to offer it to you at a special introductory price of $800000. This is a limited-time offer, so I encourage you to respond promptly.
Alice, I appreciate the offer, but I'm aiming to spend a bit less.  I'm willing to pay $700000 for the product.  Let me know if you're open to that.

Thank you for your response, Bob. We understand your budget constraints. In light of this, we are willing to consider an offer of $750000 for the product. We believe this strikes a balance between our valuation and your budget. Please let us know if this proposal works for you.
